EmailInputEdit: Additionally,  to prevent issues in the future, we recommend shutting down your computer every night and ensuring it remains connected during the scanning process
Issue: the Server Issue Ocurred in your 3Shape Unite software.
Probing Questions (Add Info):
How long has been Happening this issue?
Is happening with all the cases or just this one?
Have you done an update on the software?
Have anything changed on the network or the commputer lin the last days?
Do you have more scanners?
How many computer do you use?
RC: an internal bug in the system, which has been reported to our backend team. They are working on fixing it as soon as possible. This error typically appears because the system cannot find the necessary values associated with your username
Solution: performing an internal system reset of the server settings. Your computer has also been rebooted to ensure these settings are correctly updated.
Step 11: Repair runned of Unite software from ServerPackages folder
Step 3: in the task manager created a dump file for the  DentalDesktopServer.Service process
Step 4: logs and Dumpfile added to the case .zip folder
Step 5: shared in k:\\DK-srv-FIL-01\Coscare\Shared (no ePHI)\3DD-1.8.8.0 Server issue occured EM issue location (K-drive)
Step 8: Located Token Storage at path: C:\\ProgramData\\3ShapeDentalDesktop
Step 9: Cut both the TokenStorage and ServerTokenStorage folders and pasted to documents folder
